TopicTitle: Need models and textures for my mod

Articles.Content:
I'm currently working on a mod that adds steam rockets to the game. I've managed to get the rockets and fuel tanks working, but I'm currently using models from stock engines and tanks. Are there any modellers and/or texturers out there who would be willing to help me out?

Edited May 13, 2013 by GreenWolf
Typo

I'm currently working on a mod that adds steam tockets to the game. I've managed to get the rockets and fuel tanks working, but I'm currently using models from stock engines and tanks. Are there any modellers and/or texturers out there who would be willing to help me out?

Whats a steam tocket?

Edit: After reading it like 5 times I finally realized you prolly meant Steam Rockets. lol
